players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and he killed Alice. We need to act fast."
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on finding the real mafia among us and work together as a team."
Diana: "I believe Bob is the mafioso and I have evidence to support this. We need to be cautious and not let our guard down."
